metadata.title: CVE-2018-9536 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In numerous functions of libFDK, there are possible out of bounds writesdue to incorrect bounds checks. This could lead to remote code executionwith no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is neededfor exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-9. Android ID:A-112662184

criterions.comment: fdkaac package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
